instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..

threads.title: Did anybody noticed to many retina 13" early 2015 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with battery issues?
threads.message:
they used to come one here and one there but only this week I had 4 cases of the same model, some draining very quickly and some shut off at around 40%..
I see this model with battery issues more then others lately, I wonder..

threads.title: Did anybody noticed to many retina 13" early 2015 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with battery issues?
threads.message: I haven't had this issue yet.

threads.title: Did anybody noticed to many retina 13" early 2015 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with battery issues?
Did anybody noticed to many retina 13" early 2015 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with battery issues?
threads.message: By me the battery can be charged till 60%, and stops charging. With the same model.
